function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in waste and wastewater","Impact":"Increased risk of community transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Proper management and treatment of waste and wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced waste treatment technologies, disinfection methods","People":"Waste management workers, sewage treatment plant operators, general public","Owner":"Government, waste management agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of virus transmission in the built environment","Impact":"Unintentional exposure and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Research on virus transmission routes and building design modifications","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, building ventilation improvements","People":"Architects, engineers, building managers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness about the virus structure and implications for waste management","Impact":"Improper handling of waste and wastewater leading to transmission risk","Mitigation":"Education and training on virus characteristics and safe waste handling practices","Technologies":"Training modules, educational materials on virus structure and transmission","People":"Waste management workers, sanitation workers","Owner":"Public health organizations, waste management agencies"}]}
